Text: If you really did record this one yourself, it appears you have a video cable that's about to give out. There's some shimmering in the orange tones, I used to see this a lot in old composite and svid cables within a couple months before they got bad enough to make the picture fuzzy. Could just be an encoding artifact given the contrasting colors behind the text and the codec used, but might want to swap out the video cable if you have a spare around.
As much as I love this torrent, is there anyone who can recommend a better quality one for 1x03 and 1x04?
